mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.BIZNO, T.INSTID, T.APPLYUSERID, T.APPLYDEPID, T.FEETYPE, T.APPLYTIME, DATE_FORMAT(T.TOTALAMT,'%Y-%m-%d') TOTALAMT, DATE_FORMAT(T.GMOTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') GMOTIME FROM IM_MATERIAL_BUY T WHERE T.ISVALID=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IM_MATERIAL_BUY( ID, BIZNO, INSTID, APPLYUSERID, APPLYDEPID, FEETYPE, APPLYTIME, TOTALAMT, GMOTIME, PURPOSE )VALUES( #{ID}, #{BIZNO}, #{INSTID}, #{APPLYUSERID}, #{APPLYDEPID}, #{FEETYPE}, STR_TO_DATE(#{APPLYTIME},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{TOTALAMT}, STR_TO_DATE(#{GMOTIME},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{PURPOSE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IM_MATERIAL_BUY SET FEETYPE=#{FEETYPE}, TOTALAMT=#{TOTALAMT}, GMOTIME=STR_TO_DATE(#{GMOTIME},'%Y-%m-%d'), PURPOSE=#{PURPOSE} WHERE ID=#{ID}
